title: SOLD N28 Allen Ginter Mike King Kelly SGC Authentic (Rough)
author: piecesofthegame

posts.post_title: SOLD N28 Allen Ginter Mike King Kelly SGC Authentic (Rough)
posts.post_content:
It’s rough but authentic. Try finding one in any condition for under $1K these days. For what it’s worth, this card was discovered in the same collection as the newly discovered Roscoe Coughlin Old Judge card about 3 years ago.
